snippet.title: The Curse of Grimsey Island - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
The race is on to recover an ancient Viking artifact off the coast of Grimsey Island. Mistakes are made. People disappear. Investigate each crime scene in a completely new way and uncover secrets hidden under the ocean.

Coming to Steam PC on April 30, 2024. Wishlist now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1777060/The_Curse_Of_Grimsey_Island/

© Miga Games 2024

#mystery 
#steam 
#releasedate 
#indiegame
